  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Constants
    Holds constant values that are used through the application.
    ContactsApp
    Simple contacts application.
    Create
    Handles the creation of new contact informations.
    Delete
    Handles the deletion of lines in the text file.
    Help
    Extra help texts to be printed when called.
    Read
    Allows reading all or a specific line from the csv text file.
    Update
    Allows updating any value in the csv text file.
    Validate
    Validates all the inputs before they can be saved into the text file.
